typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		ORGANIZATION as string,
		NAME as string,
		GENDER as string,
		SPECIALITY as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP as string,
		LAT as double,
		LON as double,
		UTILIZATION as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'medstarrfpdatalakefs',
	folderPath: 'providers',
	fileName: 'providers.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> providerSource
providerSource select(mapColumn(
		NPI = Id,
		PROVIDER_TYPE = ORGANIZATION,
		NAME,
		GENDER,
		SPECIALITY,
		ADDRESS,
		CITY,
		STATE,
		ZIP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Selectproviders
Selectproviders sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'RawLakeDb',
	tableName: 'providers',
	input(
		NPI as string,
		PROVIDER_TYPE as string,
		NAME as string,
		GENDER as string,
		SPECIALITY as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP as string
	)) ~> providersSink
